`,(0,e.jsxs)(t.p,{children:["The ",(0,e.jsx)(t.strong,{children:"Comet KVM Pro"})," feels like a well-made, thought-through KVM-over-IP that cuts real friction: ",(0,e.jsx)(t.strong,{children:"touch screen"}),", ",(0,e.jsx)(t.strong,{children:"wireless setup"}),", ",(0,e.jsx)(t.strong,{children:"HDMI passthrough"})," and ",(0,e.jsx)(t.strong,{children:"mic-in/audio"}),` are the headliners. Wi-Fi 6 removes real-life annoyances of hunting for cable conneciton and HDMI Out means no \u201Clocal vs. remote\u201D issue. Mic + audio can help with WFH calls if that is your use case. The tiny 2.2" touchscreen is surprisingly handy for some quick overview and quick access to some settings.
Bottom line: a modern, no-nonsense KVM-over-IP that\u2019s earned a spot in my rack.`]}),`

frontMatter.title: GL.iNet Comet KVM Pro Review: Wi-Fi 6 KVM-over-IP with 4K HDMI Out Passthrough
frontMatter.author: Amrut Prabhu
frontMatter.summary: Comet KVM Pro packs Wi-Fi 6 KVM-over-IP, 4K30 HDMI Out, mic/audio, virtual media, Tailscale, plus cloud or self-hosted management for painless remote machine control.

prev.title: Rhasspy Speech: Boost Home Assistant Voice Control on Raspberry Pi — Faster Than Whisper
prev.author: Amrut Prabhu
prev.summary: Discover how the Rhasspy Speech addon can supercharge your Home Assistant voice assistant on Raspberry Pi. Learn setup, performance tips, and why it might beat Whisper for speed.
